name: Dumplings calf with piglet
description: Real self-made dumplings made of fluffy dough on rustic yolks and sour cream

name: Pilaf
description: Pilaf on the coals of regular rice with lamb, spices and vegetables in fat tail fat

name: Chicken on a spit
description: Served on pita bread with fresh tomato and cucumber, with pickled onions and kebab sauce

name: Chicken pock soup
description: Chicken carcass, carrots, pasta, greens, egg, salt, spices.

name: Pig Chop
description: A thick piece of steamed pork with tomatoes and mushrooms under a cheese crust

name: Calf in a creamy sauce
description: The calf with mushrooms and onions is fried in a creamy cream sauce with mashed potatoes and pickles.

name: Baked pike perch
description: Fillet of pike perch with potatoes, sour cream, herbs and onions

name: Pike ear on crucian carp
description: A rich marching ear on four fish, laurel, pepper and onion with vodka.
